title: Apple Will Show How Well Its New iPhone Is Selling
text: Apple stock is off 13% since it reported June quarter results.

title: Apple Hits Record Quarterly Smartphone Shipments in India
text: Apple has reached a significant milestone in the Indian smartphone market by recording its highest-ever quarterly shipments in the third quarter. Surpassing 2.5 million units, Apple's achievement comes at a time when the Indian smartphone market is showing signs of recovery after a period of decline, global research firm Counterpoint said in a Wednesday (Nov. 1) press release.

title: Apple earnings are on deck, and Wall Street isn't feeling so cheery
text: Apple Inc.'s AAPL September-quarter results, due out Thursday afternoon, should offer an early glimpse of the iPhone 15's performance, as the period included just over a week's worth of sales of the consumer-electronics giant's new lineup. Management's commentary on the earnings call will tell even more of the story.

title: Disney's ESPN could fetch $24B, likely buyers include Apple, Verizon: BofA
text: Bob Iger has said Disney wants to keep ESPN and will try to create a streaming app for it by either forming a joint venture or finding a buyer for a minority stake in the network.

title: Disney's ESPN could be valued at $24 bln, likely buyers include Apple, Verizon - BofA
text: Walt Disney's ESPN sports network could secure an enterprise value of $24 billion and attract investment interest from sports leagues, tech firms like Apple and telecom majors including Verizon, according to BofA Global Research.

title: UK Competition Appeal Tribunal Allows Apple Battery Lawsuit to Proceed
text: Apple Inc. has been dealt a blow in a class action lawsuit in London, as the Competition Appeal Tribunal ruled Wednesday (Nov. 1) that the case can proceed. The lawsuit accuses Apple of misleading customers about a power management tool in iPhones, Bloomberg reported Wednesday.

title: Apple's (AAPL) Q4 Earnings to Suffer from Weak Mac & iPad Sales
text: Apple's (AAPL) fourth-quarter fiscal 2023 results are expected to reflect sluggish Mac and iPad sales, as well as slowing Services revenues.

title: Apple expected to post fourth consecutive quarterly sales decline Thursday
text: Analysts haven't missed Apple's lack of growth this year and want to see the company thriving again.

title: Apple Earnings: Why Guidance Will Be Key
text: The Cupertino-based company reports earnings for its fiscal fourth quarter on Thursday. The success of Apple's newest products will likely play a key role in whether the tech giant will guide for top-line growth in fiscal Q1.

title: The Wealth Builder's Toolkit: Top 3 Stocks to Supercharge Your Portfolio
text: I'm tasked with coming up with three stocks to buy that will supercharge your portfolio. These are companies whose stocks will build wealth over time.

title: Apple Must Face Lawsuit Alleging It 'Throttled' IPhones To Cover Up Defective Batteries, U.K. Tribunal Rules
text: The lawsuit follows a similar class action lawsuit in the U.S. for which Apple is paying out up to $500 million in settlements.

title: Unveiling Apple (AAPL) Q4 Outlook: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
text: Besides Wall Street's top -and-bottom-line estimates for Apple (AAPL), review projections for some of its key metrics to gain a deeper understanding of how the company might have fared during the quarter ended September 2023.

title: How Apple's thinking about AI spending and deployment differs from Big Tech rivals
text: Microsoft, Google, Meta and Amazon talk up their generative AI chatbots and large language models. Apple is mostly quiet, but it's made many AI acquisitions.

title: Apple Stock In A $300 Billion Rut Since Its Last Earnings Report
text: Apple will report quarterly results Thursday afternoon, hoping to avoid a repeat of its last earnings report, which caused an immediate 5% selloff.

title: This one stock could potentially undo the 2023 rebound if it falls another 10% as one analyst expects
text: Can the S&P 500 index and Nasdaq Composite hold on to their 2023 gains if Nvidia Corp. falls? It's a question that's cropping up more and more these days.

title: Mass lawsuit against Apple over iPhone batteries can go ahead, London tribunal rules
text: Apple Inc on Wednesday lost a bid to block a mass London lawsuit accusing it of hiding defective batteries in millions of iPhones by "throttling" them with software updates.

title: New Apple Watch to detect blood pressure, sleep apnea; health coach service planned: Report
text: Apple reportedly plans to add a blood pressure sensor and sleep apnea detection in 2024 Apple Watch, in addition to a new health coaching service.

title: In the Northeast, a wet autumn has become an ‘apple-picking apocalypse'
text: At least that's how The New York Times is describing the situation for pick-your-own farms in New York State, which have suffered through two months of consecutive weekends marred partly or fully by rain.

title: After a 540% Rise, Why Does Warren Buffett Still Own Apple Stock?
text: Apple has been a wildly successful investment for Berkshire Hathaway. Buffett's favorite holding period is forever, and he still might see strong returns from the tech titan going forward.

title: Stocks to Sell Now Before Momentum Reverses: AAPL, NVDA and TSLA
text: Tech stocks have had a bad October, as the Nasdaq Index fell by over 3.89%. Several factors were at play.

title: Better Buy: Apple vs. Coca-Cola
text: Apple faces a slowdown over the next few quarters. Coca-Cola continues to generate stable growth in a tough market.

title: Is Apple Stock a Buy?
text: Apple's stock has dipped nearly 15% since August. The company has suffered from repeated declines in product sales.
